title: May God Forgive You... But I Won't

sources.title: May God Forgive You... But I Won't (1968) George Ardisson | Spaghetti Western | Full Movie
sources.description:
While Cjamango is away from his ranch six bandits attack and kill all the members of his family. Disrupted by this tragedy he sets out to take his revenge. One by one he kills the bandits and learns along the way that a relative of his wife are involved in this crime. 

This film is available with English and Italian audio. And subtitles in many more language options.

Original title: Chiedi perdono a Dio... non a me (1968)
Director & Writer: Vincenzo Musolino
Genres: Drama, Western

Main Cast:
George Ardisson as Django / Cjamango McDonald
Dragomir BojaniÄ‡ as Dick Smart (credited as "Anthony Ghidra")
Peter Martell as Jack Smart
Cristina Iosani as Virginia Stuart
Dante Maggio as Bartender
Luigi Pavese as Stuart
"Pedro Sanchez as Barrica 
Lilli Lembo as Dick's Friend
Tano Cimarosa as a Bandit


00:00 Full Spaghetti Western Movie
06:33 Through the morning mist, Django discovers his murdered family at their ransacked homestead.
21:15 Jack Smart mocks Django's quest for vengeance at the crowded saloon.
35:48 Without warning, Django unleashes his fury on Stewart's henchmen during the cattle drive.
48:22 In the desert canyon, Virginia reveals the shocking truth about Dick Smart's involvement.
1:02:17 Amidst flying bullets, Sam provides Django with a devastating new weapon for his revenge.
1:23:45 Under the blood-red sunset, Django and Dick Smart face off in their final, explosive confrontation.
